mapper.select: select d.id, d.name, d.category_id, d.price, d.image, d.description, d.status, d.update_time, c.name as categoryName, df.id as df_id, df.name as df_name, df.value as df_value, df.dish_id df_dish_id from dish d left outer join category c on d.category_id = c.id left outer join dish_flavor df on d.id = df.dish_id where d.id = #{id}
